title: 407: Our Bedroom BTS + Lying to Each Other
itunes:title: 407: Our Bedroom BTS + Lying to Each Other
description:
While Bekah is away (don’t worry - she’ll be back next episode) Jess is joined by her husband Evan to answer all the #broadsquad’s juicy questions! They discuss Evan’s quirks, their s*x life, keeping the excitement alive, when you start feeling like roommates, Jess’ bipolar disorder, and much more.
